configuration:
vocp.gate.gatePluginArchive /home/centos/FinalVOCP/plugins.zip Path to Gate Pipeline zip file
hadoop.config /etc/hadoop/conf/ Hadoop configuration path
hbase.inputColumnFamilies p,gen,ner,f Hbase input column families
hbase.flagColumnFamily f Hbase flag column family
hbase.flagColumn rStatus Hbase flag column
property> hbase.outputTable regimenSegments Hbase output table
